https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fsAbqw8e04RwZLFPop5spARaR56.jpg Scarlett is a chef and co-owner of a restaurant. This year, her best friend buys her a ticket to a holiday cooking getaway, where Scarlett will relearn festive cooking, and maybe find love in a handsome rival chef from her past. A Christmas to Savour
